attributes.action: I call for the country to enter into a general election before article 50 begins
attributes.additional_details: If a political party campaigns to stay in the EU the people can give a fresh mandate to government if they elect them.
attributes.background: I believe that the vote to leave the EU was too close and this is such a major decision. I also believe that the campaign to remain was not done well and the champagne to leave was full of misrepresentation.
